<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> those <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3435>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3435>defiled<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3933>virgins.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G3699%G99999>wherever<s%> he <S%G5217>goes.<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> were <S%G59>redeemed<s%> by Jesus <S%G575>from<s%> among <S%G444>men,<s%> the first <S%G536>fruits<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1388>lie,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G299>blameless.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G243>Another,<s%> a second <S%G32>angel,<s%> <S%G190>followed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G897>"Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> has <S%G4098>fallen,<s%> <S%G4098><s%> <S%G3754>which<s%> has <S%G4222>made<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> to <S%G4222>drink<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G846>her<s%> sexual <S%G4202>immorality.<s%>"

<S%G5602>Here<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5281>patience<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G5602><s%> those who <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G906>thrust<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5166>gathered<s%> the <S%G288>vintage<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>threw<s%> it <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3025>winepress<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
